content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to install 'arcgis' multiple times but received failure messages each time. I executed a series of commands to add the path to the 'arcgis' module, connect to ArcGIS Online, create a new web map, add a feature layer to the map, and save the web map. An AI sent me a command to execute Python code to generate a river map, which I did successfully. I then checked the Python version and installed 'arcgis' again using 'pip'. The 'pip show arcgis' command returned a warning that the package was not found. I executed 'pip install arcgis' again and received a subprocess with PID: '4893'. The AI sent me a command to generate a river map using Python code, which I executed successfully. I then executed a command to check the system path and received a response.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result')]
"""
